org.hkijena.jipipe.extensions.imagejdatatypes.colorspace

Interface ColorSpace

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GreyscaleColorSpace, HSBColorSpace, IgnoreColorSpace, LABColorSpace, RGBColorSpace

    public interface ColorSpace
    A class that governs conversion between color spaces

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int composePixel(int... channelValues)
      Converts an array of channel values into a pixel
      void convert(ij.ImagePlus img, ColorSpace imgSpace, JIPipeProgressInfo progressInfo)
      Converts the image into the current color space
      int convert(int pixel, ColorSpace imgSpace)
      Converts a single pixel from its source image space into this one
      void convertToRGB(ij.ImagePlus img, JIPipeProgressInfo progressInfo)
      Converts the color image into RGB (in-place)
      int convertToRGB(int pixel)
      Converts a single pixel from its source image space into RGB
      void decomposePixel(int pixel, int[] channelValues)
      Decomposes an integer pixel value into its channel values
      String getChannelName(int channelIndex)
      Returns the channel name for a given channel index
      String getChannelShortName(int channelIndex)
      Returns the channel name for a given channel index
      int getNChannels()

    • Method Detail

      • convertToRGB

        void convertToRGB(ij.ImagePlus img,
                  JIPipeProgressInfo progressInfo)
        Converts the color image into RGB (in-place)
        Parameters:
        img - the image
        progressInfo - the progress info

      • convert

        void convert(ij.ImagePlus img,
             ColorSpace imgSpace,
             JIPipeProgressInfo progressInfo)
        Converts the image into the current color space
        Parameters:
        img - the image
        imgSpace - the color space of the image
        progressInfo - the progress

      • convert

        int convert(int pixel,
            ColorSpace imgSpace)
        Converts a single pixel from its source image space into this one
        Parameters:
        pixel - the pixel (24 bit)
        imgSpace - the pixel image space
        Returns:
        the converted pixel

      • convertToRGB

        int convertToRGB(int pixel)
        Converts a single pixel from its source image space into RGB
        Parameters:
        pixel - the pixel (24 bit)
        Returns:
        the converted pixel (in RGB)

      • getNChannels

        int getNChannels()
        Returns the number of pixel channels. For example, 3 for RGB colors
        Returns:
        number of pixel channels

      • getChannelName

        String getChannelName(int channelIndex)
        Returns the channel name for a given channel index
        Parameters:
        channelIndex - the channel index
        Returns:
        the channel name

      • getChannelShortName

        String getChannelShortName(int channelIndex)
        Returns the channel name for a given channel index
        Parameters:
        channelIndex - the channel index
        Returns:
        the channel name

      • composePixel

        int composePixel(int... channelValues)
        Converts an array of channel values into a pixel
        Parameters:
        channelValues - the channel values. must have at least getNChannels() items
        Returns:
        the pixel

      • decomposePixel

        void decomposePixel(int pixel,
                    int[] channelValues)
        Decomposes an integer pixel value into its channel values
        Parameters:
        pixel - the pixel
        channelValues - array with at least getNChannels() items. The values will be written into this array.
